main: ^As you reach a crosswalk, a crowd of civilians cross... and cross... and cross. They don't seem to be stopping anytime soon.

c-0: ^Startled, some of the passersby drop their bags. Some people...
c-1: ^You slowly inch forward into the stream of people and they flow around you like water. Within a couple seconds, you're on the other side of the strange deluge. How bizarre...
c-2: ^You floor the accelerator, tires squealing. You don't hit anyone, luckily, but people have to throw themselves out of the way. Somehow, a purse ends up snagged to the hood ornament.
